sentence.Network_en: She laboured under the illusion that I knew what I was doing.
sentence.Network_cn: 她有一个错觉，以为我知道自己在做什么。

sentence.Network_en: It is a sneaky and underhand way of doing business.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种做生意的方式偷偷摸摸，遮遮掩掩。

sentence.Network_en: On her own ground she knows exactly what she's doing.
sentence.Network_cn: 她在自己熟悉的领域里对自己的行为有十足的把握。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语中keep... ... doing 使某人做某事，使役动词后加原形 doing sth. 使某人一直做某事 keep sb doing sth. 意思是继续做某事.
英文字根单词 ... （inter+pose 放→放在二者之间） （mis+doing 做事） （inter+sect 切割 →在中间切→横断）.
简明英语语法--相关文章 ...  find sb do/doing sth 发现某人做某事。 see sb do/doing sth 看见某人做某事。.
成考专... ... in badly need of / in lack of / in want of 急需，缺乏 71. object to sth / doing sth 反对某事/ 反对做某事 73.

lj.lj_ly: he looked at Lisa as though it was all her doing.

sentences.en: Tell me about all your doings in London.
sentences.cn: 把你在伦敦所作的事情全告诉我。

sentences.en: I never heard of such doings.
I can’t be doing with people who complain all the time.
sentences.cn: 我无法忍受那些整天发牢骚的人。

sentences.en: Getting it finished by tomorrow will take some doing.
sentences.cn: 要在明天完成有点难度。

sentences.en: It’s going to take some doing to do the report on time, but we should manage it.
sentences.cn: 要按时完成报告有难度，不过我们会设法完成的。

sentences.en: What are these shoes doing on my desk?
sentences.cn: 这些鞋怎么在我的桌子上？
